column2: the  above  pretext,  having  considered  all
circumstances of the case, it is my considered view that the cancellation of
the registration of the said mosque by the Wakf Board in terms of section 13(c)
is rightful, as the registration in the first instance was caused by reason of a
mistake of law and fact. Therefore, I affirm the Order of the Wakf Tribunal of
Sri Lanka dated 16.02.2019 in case bearing No. WT/250/2017.
